>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.lX8x7huS9M0gGIcr]{Kalistocrat}

Your meditations have allowed you to exert power over your body that you might not be able to do otherwise. Each day, choose one of the following feats as a bonus feat, even if you don’t meet the prerequisites: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.gHFaGEQj42de9zmT]{Improved Great Fortitude}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.wkYOPC6hK4otQ4K8]{Improved Iron Will}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.spAncs884V1Xlyz2]{Improved Lightning Reflexes}. If your chosen feat’s prerequisites are met by the feat chosen for @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetype-features.Item.SLYLlu45CMugn1u2]{Body and Mind}, you don’t have to spend a Resolve Point the first time you reroll a failed save each day.
